EMAILADDRESSCONFIRMATIONCOMPONENT.SUCCESS: Your e-mail address has been successfully activated!
EMAILADDRESSCONFIRMATIONCOMPONENT.FAIL: Your e-mail address could not be activated.
EMAILADDRESSCONFIRMATIONCOMPONENT.GOTOLOGIN: Please click the button below to log in to your account.
EMAILADDRESSCONFIRMATIONCOMPONENT.CONTACTSUPPORT: Please contact support to get a new e-mail activation link.

ERRORS.CONFIRMUSERFAILURE: Something went wrong during user account confirmation. Please try again.
ERRORS.USERDOESNOTEXIST: User account could not be identified for verification.
ERRORS.USERPASSWORDNOTVALIDBYPOLICY: The provided password does not comply the password policy. Choose a valid password.
ERRORS.PASSWORDANDCONFIRMPASSWORDNOTMATCH: The two passwords do not match.

CONFIRMUSERCOMPONENT.PASSWORDPOLICYDIGITS: It must contain at least one digit.
CONFIRMUSERCOMPONENT.PASSWORDPOLICYSPECIALCHARACTERS: It must contain at least one non-alphanumeric character.
CONFIRMUSERCOMPONENT.PASSWORDPOLICYLENGTH: Its length must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters.
CONFIRMUSERCOMPONENT.PASSWORDPOLICYUPPERCASELETTER: It must contain at least one uppercase letter.
CONFIRMUSERCOMPONENT.SUCCESS: You have successfully activated your account! Plese click the below button if you wish to log in.
CONFIRMUSERCOMPONENT.TOKENEXPIRED: Your activation link has expired. Please contact support for recieving a new user account confirmation link.
CONFIRMUSERCOMPONENT.WELCOME: Dear {{firstName}}! To active your user account you have to provide a password which complies the password policy consists of the below rules:

ERRORS.USEREMAILINVALIDFORMAT: This is not a valid e-mail address.
ERRORS.USERLOCKEDOUT: User has been locked out due to unsuccessful login attempts.
ERRORS.LOGINEMAILNOTCONFIRMED: The email address of the user account is not confirmed.
ERRORS.LOGININVALIDUSERNAMEORPASSWORD: The provided credentials are not valid.
